faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services, process, and delivery.
faq.clickToExpand: Click a question to see the answer
faq.moreQuestions: Have more questions? We're here to help.
faq.q1: What's included in your video production packages?
faq.a1: Our packages include everything from initial consultation and creative concept development to final delivery. This covers pre-production planning, professional filming with cinema-grade equipment, post-production editing, color grading, audio mixing, and optimized exports for your chosen platforms. We also provide project management and unlimited communication throughout the process.
faq.q2: How long does a typical project take from start to finish?
faq.a2: Timeline depends on project scope and complexity. For standard corporate videos or property showcases, we typically deliver within 7-10 business days after filming. More complex projects like brand documentaries or multi-location shoots may take 2-3 weeks. We always provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation to align with your marketing schedule.
faq.q3: Do you work with international brands and multilingual content?
faq.a3: Absolutely. We specialize in creating content for international audiences and regularly work with brands across Europe and beyond. We offer comprehensive multilingual solutions including subtitling, voice-over, and translation services in English, French, German, and Italian. Our content is designed to resonate across different markets and cultural contexts.
faq.q4: What makes your approach different from other video agencies?
faq.a4: As a boutique two-person team, we offer direct access to the creatives working on your project, ensuring your vision is perfectly captured. Every project receives our full attention, with no outsourcing or junior teams. We combine Swiss precision with cinematic storytelling, using only professional cinema-grade equipment and advanced post-production techniques.
faq.q5: Can you handle both video and photography for the same project?
faq.a5: Yes, we're a full-service visual content studio. We can capture both high-quality video and photography during the same production day, maximizing efficiency and ensuring visual consistency across all your content. This approach is particularly valuable for real estate, corporate, and brand projects where you need a complete content suite.

projects.penthouseSeoTitle: Real Estate Video Production Zurich | Property Marketing Switzerland | Prestige Production
projects.penthouseSeoDescription: We create videos that sell properties in Zurich and across Switzerland. Professional real estate content that gets results for agents and developers.
projects.penthouseSeoKeywords: real estate video Zurich, property video Switzerland, real estate marketing Zurich, property videos Switzerland, real estate photography Zurich, property marketing videos Switzerland
projects.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

penthouse.title: A penthouse story
penthouse.description: We partnered with Zurich Sotheby's International Realty to bring to life one of Zurich's most exceptional properties, a 304 m² penthouse perched atop the Mobimo Tower. Through cinematic visuals, architectural storytelling, and a detail-oriented production process, we created a complete content suite tailored to the luxury market.

penthouse.resultsDesc: Exceptional engagement and performance across platforms

results.topPerformerDesc: Second highest engagement on Zurich Sotheby's Instagram page
results.growthDesc: Than their usual content + significant follower growth

whyUs.testimonial: "The video content transformed how buyers perceived our property, creating an emotional connection that photos alone could not achieve."

smi.seoTitle: Swiss Mining Institute 2024 - Premium Event Production | Prestige Production
smi.seoDescription: Discover our premium video production coverage of the Swiss Mining Institute 2024 - the most prestigious mining conference in Europe. Featuring exclusive interviews, aftermovies, and luxury event content.

smi.subtitle: The most prestigious mining conference in the world
smi.intro1Part2: the biggest and most exclusive mining conference in Europe
smi.intro1Part3: Hosting 1000+ investors, 100+ listed companies and over 2700 meetings arranged over 2 days.
smi.intro2: For two days, we captured everything a camera lens could reach. From interviews, panel discussions and the official aftermovie to photos, social content and more, we delivered it all.

responsibilities.0: Conduct stakeholder workshop to capture objectives, audience, and key messages.
responsibilities.1: Research market trends and competitor content for strategic insights.
responsibilities.2: Draft a comprehensive creative brief outlining scope, deliverables, and timelines.

responsibilities.0: Develop compelling narrative structure and write detailed script.
responsibilities.1: Design storyboard panels illustrating key scenes and camera angles.
responsibilities.2: Review and refine script/storyboard with client approvals at each stage.

responsibilities.0: Scout locations, acquire permits, and schedule shoot logistics.
responsibilities.1: Coordinate crew, equipment rental, casting talent, and wardrobe.
responsibilities.2: Create shooting schedule and call sheets for seamless production flow.

responsibilities.0: Direct on-set production, manage camera, lighting, and sound.
responsibilities.1: Guide talent performance and ensure alignment with creative vision.
responsibilities.2: Monitor and back up captured footage for quality assurance.

responsibilities.0: Edit raw footage, apply color correction, sound mixing, and graphics.
responsibilities.1: Integrate client feedback through iterative review cycles.
responsibilities.2: Finalize video master and prepare versions for different platforms.

responsibilities.0: Export videos in required formats and resolutions.
responsibilities.1: Upload to hosting platforms and optimize metadata.
responsibilities.2: Develop distribution strategy across owned and paid channels, track analytics.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Prestige Production, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you contact us through our website form, email, or phone. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and project details.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, provide our video and photography services, and communicate with you about your projects. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties.

section3.title: Data Protection
section3.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your information is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel.

section4.title: Your Rights
section4.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at info@prestigeproduction.ch.

section5.title: Contact Information
section5.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at info@prestigeproduction.ch or call +41 76 202 19 59.
